detail_desc: Playsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Elasticated, drawstring seam at the waist, and side pockets.

Playsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Elasticated, drawstring seam at the waist, and side pockets.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in seersucker made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight cut with a seam at the hips and a gathered, flared skirt. Cotton lining.

Blouse in woven fabric with embroidered details, a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum. Scalloped edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Knee-length jersey cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid, V-shaped waist, wide sides and a high cut at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.

High-waisted leggings in imitation leather with an elasticated waist.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, visible button fly, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, visible button fly, front and back pockets and skinny legs.

Long jersey dress with a deep V-neck, long sleeves, seam at the waist with a decorative tie detail and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Set with a pre-tied bow tie and a patterned handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.

Short dress in a soft viscose weave with flounces. Wrapover front, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and ties at one side. Unlined.
Trousers in twill made from a cotton blend with a high waist, detachable fabric belt, zip fly and button and zipped front pockets.
Sleeveless maxi dress in jersey and lace with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist.

Sleeveless all-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and short legs with ribbed hems. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Scarf in a wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 180x30 cm.

Outdoor jacket in sturdy jersey with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

Pyjamas in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a gathered seam at the top and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Hat in a linen and cotton blend with a contrasting colour band. Lined. Width of brim 3 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short butterfly sleeves, short legs and press-stud fastenings.
Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Cap with a woven front and mesh back. Appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases and a gentle flare to the hem.
Scarf in soft woven fabric with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 35x180 cm.
Boxy-style cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front and short slits in the sides.
